content.text:
# Super Robot Wars 64

| genre = Tactical role-playing
| modes = Single-player
| platforms = Nintendo 64
}}
is a tactical role-playing game for the Nintendo 64 and part of series of same name. It was released only in Japan in 1999. The game can make use of the Nintendo 64's Transfer Pak with the Game Boy Color game Super Robot Wars: Link Battler.
Reception
On release, Famitsu magazine scored the game a 30 out of 40.
